snippet: World number two Andy Murray was satisfied with the start to his season after romping past France's Kenny de Schepper 6-2 6-2 at the Hopman Cup in Perth, Australia on Monday....
lead_paragraph: World number two Andy Murray was satisfied with the start to his season after romping past France's Kenny de Schepper 6-2 6-2 at the Hopman Cup in Perth, Australia on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Murray Starts Season With Easy Win at Hopman Cup
headline.main: Murray Starts Season With Easy Win at Hopman Cup
